General.Name: Century Aluminum Company
General.Description: Century Aluminum Company, together with its subsidiaries, produces standard-grade and value-added primary aluminum products in the United States and Iceland. It also owns and operates a carbon anode production facility in the Netherlands. Century Aluminum Company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Chicago, Illinois.
General.Address: One South Wacker Drive, Chicago, IL, United States, 60606
